title: F.R.I.E.N.D.S
description: A classic sitcom about six friends in New York navigating life, love, and hilarious misadventures.

title: Squid Game
description: A South Korean thriller where financially desperate individuals compete in deadly children's games for a massive cash prize.

title: The Rookie
description: A crime drama about a 40-year-old man who becomes the oldest rookie in the Los Angeles police force.

title: Arcane
description: A visually stunning animated series exploring the origins of League of Legends champions in the city of Piltover and the undercity Zaun.
director: Christian Linke, Alex Yee, JB Blanc

title: Black Mirror
description: A thought-provoking anthology series exploring the dark side of technology and human nature.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A gripping drama following a high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer.

title: Community
description: A meta-humor-filled sitcom about an unlikely group of students at a community college.

title: Doctor Who
description: A long-running sci-fi series following the adventures of the Doctor, a time-traveling alien exploring the universe.
director: Sydney Newman, C. E. Webber, Donald Wilson

title: DuckTales
description: An animated adventure following Scrooge McDuck and his nephews on treasure-hunting quests.
director: Jymn Magon, Bob Hathcock, Alan Zaslove

title: Family Guy
description: An animated sitcom about the Griffin family and their satirical take on American life.

title: For All Mankind
description: An alternate history drama exploring what would have happened if the Soviet Union had landed on the Moon first.
director: Ronald D. Moore, Ben Nedivi, Matt Wolpert

title: Game of Thrones
description: A fantasy epic based on George R.R. Martin's novels, depicting the power struggles between noble families.
director: David Benioff, D.B. Weiss, George R.R. Martin, etc.

title: Gravity Falls
description: A mystery-filled animated series following twins Dipper and Mabel in a strange Oregon town.

title: Police Squad!
description: A hilarious parody of police procedurals starring Leslie Nielsen.
director: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker

title: Stranger Things
description: A supernatural thriller about a group of kids uncovering government secrets and strange occurrences in their town.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A Star Wars series following the journey of a lone bounty hunter in the galaxy's outer reaches.
director: Jon Favreau, Dave Filoni, Rick Famuyiwa, etc.

title: The Simpsons
description: A satirical animated sitcom about the everyday lives of the Simpson family.
director: Matt Groening, James L. Brooks, Sam Simon

title: The Witcher
description: A fantasy series following the monster hunter Geralt of Rivia as he navigates a war-torn world.
director: Alik Sakharov, Alex Garcia Lopez, Charlotte Brändström, etc.

title: Tulsa King
description: A crime drama starring Sylvester Stallone as a mob boss rebuilding his empire in Tulsa.
